fullText: Al Pacino gives a blistering performance as the desperate salesman Ricky Roma in this revival of David Mamet's Pulitzer Prize-winning play about real estate hustlers.
dtliExcerpt: Al Pacino gives a blistering performance as the desperate salesman Ricky Roma in this revival of David Mamet's Pulitzer Prize-winning play about real estate hustlers.
